name: MPT 7B Instruct
description: MPT-7B-Instruct is a model for short-form instruction following. It's built by finetuning MPT-7B on a dataset derived from the Databricks Dolly-15k and the Anthropic Helpful and Harmless (HH-RLHF) datasets. Its inference can be run on various GPU configurations. It's released under cc-by-sa-3.0 which enables commercial usage with proper credits.
